mainEntity.name: What technical SEO issues do Sydney websites commonly have?

acceptedAnswer.text: Common technical SEO issues we fix for Sydney websites include: slow page loading speeds, mobile responsiveness problems, duplicate content issues, missing or poorly written meta descriptions, broken internal links, improper URL structure, missing schema markup, and Google Analytics/Search Console setup issues. We provide comprehensive technical audits and fixes.

mainEntity.name: How important is mobile optimization for Sydney businesses?

acceptedAnswer.text: Mobile optimization is crucial for Sydney businesses as over 60% of local searches are performed on mobile devices.
